data.name: zomboDRIVE: Apocalyptic Road Trip
data.detailed_description:
Get in the car and go on a dangerous adventure in the post-apocalyptic world. <- Best description ever

FEATURES
- Cars for driving: little, Medium and BIG
- Explore random generated world with different bioms (they will still repeat, haha)
- Beware of radiation zones (oh those CLICKS...........................................)
- Protect yourself from ZOMBIES (little secret: they are very afraid of flying pans)
- Real-time day to night cycle and many weathers (our artist said that this is a killer feature)
- Online radio in your car!
- EXPLOSION IN MAIN MENU!!!
- And you can collect a collection of bugs! (really, it's early access though)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
